RECORD.TEXT: 884948991 PUOMC 6857671 91825/q468 156535 5/23/1995 12:00:00 AM RENAL CELL CARCINOMA . Unsigned DIS Report Status : Unsigned ADMISSION DATE : 5/23/95 DISCHARGE DATE : 5/30/95 Renal cell carcinoma . ASSOCIATED DIAGNOSIS : Hypertension . PRINCIPAL PROCEDURE : Right radical nephrectomy on 5/23/95 . MEDICATIONS ON DISCHARGE : Percocet . HISTORY OF PRESENT ILLNESS : This 60 year old female presents with a mass in her right kidney and she was admitted a Same Day admit for right radical nephrectomy . This was carried out uneventfully , and pathology revealed a renal cell carcinoma . Postoperatively , she had a rather prolonged episode of ileus . She also had some respiratory problems requiring formal chest physical therapy and otherwise did quite well . Her postoperative creatinine was 0.8 . Electrolytes were 135 , 4.5 , chloride 101 , CO2 31 , hematocrit 34.8 . Preoperative evaluation revealed bone scan with no evidence of metastatic disease . Electrocardiogram showed sinus bradycardia . She will be follow up as an outpatient after her discharge . NAMAIREGID SHUFF , M.D. TR : DD : 6/5/95 TD : 06/09/95 Dr. The Vein [ report_end ]
